bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Shunt Power Capacitors
IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Shunt Power Capacitors
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1036/D15, Mar 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide applies to the use of 50 Hz and 60 Hz shunt power capacitor units rated 2400 Vac and above, and assemblies of such capacitors. Included are guidelines for the application, protection, and ratings of equipment for the safe and reliable utilization of shunt power capacitors. The guide is general and intended to be basic and supplemental to specific recommendations of the manufacturer. The guide covers applications that range from simple capacitor unit utilization to complex capacitor bank situations.
